name: Phantast
description:
Your home is under attack by the competing tribe, and it is your job to save it!

You just wanted to live a quiet life with your family and friends, but it is not easy when everyone hates you. So what if your ancestors stole their land and their gold millennia ago? That does not give them the right to send monsters and mercenaries to your doorstep to retrieve it.

And, when you are a Phantast named Phantast, there is no way your patriotism would ever let you give up what now belongs to you. It is for your tribe only.

Features:
  • Exciting top-down shooter gameplay with waves of monsters
  • 40 levels
  • Awesome weapons
  • Quirky atmosphere

Note: 10% of the net revenue earned from this game goes to #TeamTrees.
